messages.message:
Hello! We're about to de-betafy Redactor (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/10851) :tada:  :tada:  :tada:. @Chetan has been plowing through the launch checklist like a champion, and has added:
• audit logs
• metrics
• documentation
• ACLs
• automated UAT
PRs have been signed off on by @Aaron Tami @shaunak @Heymian

The overall productionizing epic can be viewed at https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/MINT-106

Please let us know if you have any last concerns before EOD tomorrow!
speak now or forever be redacted
I wish we had a clip of Arnold saying "YOU HAVE BEEN REDACTED"
That’s awesome!! Thanks for leading a very regimented effort! We certainly could use this on other apps as well (audit-logs / metrics) — even those that are likely in Production — thanks!
@lydia @Chetan one more thing that I was planning to include for Flow steps: putting a timeout on the redactor steps.  You can look at other examples in tasks.py :slightly_smiling_face:

We already have one I believe: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/py-utils/flow-lib/src/py/instabase/flow_lib/ibsteps/hydrated/hydrated_apply_annotator_app.py#L14  which is defined https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/137598b32c838d85b5da13893ffef33596401a62/shared-utils/py-utils/config-utils/src/py/instabase/config_utils/config.py#L195
